texts.text: Baldino has been working on a Jet-Pack prototype for days now. He needs a rheostat to finish his work. Rheostat can usually be found in hair dryers.
The horse in the old burg's stables is hungry. If you find something to feed him he told you that he would give you a ride.
My kingdom for a ferry ride.
The sailor on citadel island asked you to put a bit of order in the warehouse. There is 4 boxes in there that need some arrangement.
